name: Star Fortress (itch)
description:
2d Side Scroller Action Adventure where you attempt to escape a space station before you either run out of oxygen or it explodes.

All assets were created from scratch for the 2021 Epic Mega Jam.

Brett Ingram: Programming/Scripting

Austin Edwards: Programming/Scripting

Nate Bryant: All 2d Assets

Bea Godeaux: Main Menu
